daily_git_data module¶

daily_git_data.create_day_dict(date, files, time_spent, additions, deletions, commit_count)[source]¶
daily_git_data.get_daily_commit_data(progress_file, max_change=None, timeout=None)[source]¶
daily_git_data.select_best(files)[source]¶

Selects 3 best files from a list based on the quantity (additions-deletions) for each file :param file_list is a list of dictionaries, each with a filename and net_changes property net_changes = additions - deletions :return a list of the top 3 files
